title: CEP Campaign Finance Committee Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of campaign finance committees (candidate, party, PAC, etc.).

terms.label: Principal Campaign Committee
terms.definition: A committee designated as the primary campaign committee for a specific candidate.

terms.label: Party Committee
terms.definition: A committee established and maintained by a political party organization.

terms.label: Political Action Committee
terms.definition: A committee that receives contributions and makes expenditures to influence elections but is not a party or candidate committee.

terms.label: Independent Expenditure Only Committee
terms.definition: A committee that makes only independent expenditures and does not contribute directly to candidates or parties.

terms.label: Leadership PAC
terms.definition: A political action committee established or controlled by a current or former candidate or officeholder.

terms.label: Ballot Measure Committee
terms.definition: A committee organized primarily to support or oppose a ballot measure or referendum.

terms.label: Independent Expenditure Committee
terms.definition: A committee whose primary activity is making independent expenditures in support of or opposition to candidates or ballot measures.

terms.label: Other Committee Type
terms.definition: A committee whose type does not fit any more specific category in this vocabulary.
